Docs.summary: Provides a drop shadow for display by classes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> displays a ShadowGlyph if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.ShowDropShadow%2A> property is set to `true`.
